description.value:
Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement)
This grisly helm is made from the leatherâ€‘reinforced skull and antlers of a deer with a fox skull and hide stretched over it. It is secured by a strap made from a magically preserved length of deer entrails.
While wearing this helm, you gain a +1 bonus to AC, and you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) and Wisdom (Survival) checks.
